TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CustomTypeDescriptor extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor
Public MustInherit Class CustomTypeDescriptor Implements ICustomTypeDescriptor

summary.span: 提供 介面的簡單預設實作。

span.span: Provides a simple default implementation of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像、類別類型的父物件必須仰賴建構時提供。Like , the class relies on a parent object of type supplied during construction. 這可讓類別衍生自選擇性地覆寫的方法。This allows classes that derive from to selectively override methods.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式相當於呼叫其他建構函式的參數與`null`。This constructor is equivalent to calling the other constructor with a parameter that is `null`. 所有方法建立與這個建構函式會傳回預設值。All methods of a created with this constructor will return default values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor parent) cil managed

span.span: The parent custom type descriptor.

summary.span: 使用父自訂型別描述項，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using a parent custom type descriptor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`parent`參數是`null`，則所有方法會傳回預設值。If the `parent` parameter is `null`, all methods will return default values. 否則，所有方法會將委派的方法`parent`。Otherwise, all methods will delegate to the methods of `parent`. 大部分方法會傳回`null`預設。Most methods return `null` by default. 下表顯示不會傳回方法的傳回值`null`預設。The following table shows the return values for the methods that do not return `null` by default. |方法Method|預設的傳回值Default return value| |------------|--------------------------| ||空白的屬性集合 ()。An empty attribute collection ().| ||預設值執行個體。The default instance.| ||空白的事件集合 ()。An empty events collection ().| ||空白的屬性集合 ()。An empty property collection ().|

Public Overridable Function GetAttributes () As AttributeCollection

summary.span: 傳回這個型別描述項所表示之型別的自訂屬性集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of custom attributes for the type represented by this type descriptor.
An containing the attributes for the type.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果父代自訂類型描述元傳遞建構函式，方法會呼叫父代的對應方法。If a parent custom type descriptor was passed to the constructor, the method will call the parent's corresponding method.

returns.span: ，包含此類型描述元所描述之類型的完整類別名稱。

span.span: A containing the fully qualified class name of the type this type descriptor is describing.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 不是靜態方法，因此，不保證是安全執行緒。 is not a static method and thus, is not guaranteed to be thread-safe. 如果父代自訂類型描述元傳遞建構函式，方法會呼叫父代的對應方法。If a parent custom type descriptor was passed to the constructor, the method will call the parent's corresponding method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法傳回的，其代表此類型描述元物件的事件描述項集合。The method returns a collection of event descriptors for the object this type descriptor is representing. 可能提供選擇性的屬性陣列，來篩選傳回的集合。An optional attribute array may be provided to filter the collection that is returned. 如果沒有父代為提供，則方法會傳回。If no parent is provided, the method will return .
